# Horizontal alignment modes

**API Collection**

These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATextLayer/alignmentMode] property.

## Constants

- **natural**: Use the natural alignment of the text’s script.
- **left**: Text is visually left aligned.
- **right**: Text is visually right aligned.
- **center**: Text is visually center aligned.
- **justified**: Text is justified.

## Constants

- **Truncation modes**: These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATextLayer/truncationMode] property.
